item.description:
Photo Opening featuring Matt Kahn's Galapagos photos at Aram?s Comjean?s studio.
Note: once inside the Building look for signs for RED Pine Studios, Parking: park on street on legal spots.

There will be a photos from Matt?s + Aram?s Collection hanging in the new space. The opening begins at 6:00. Around 7:30 there will be 3 photo talks/slide shows by Matt?s + Aram?s + maybe me Biagio (only if there is time each presentation will be about 15 minutes. Light refreshment will be served.
Please join in the fun, mingle with other up and coming photographers and shares your comments on the Photo show. Thanks Aram, Matt + Biagio

Web link to Red Pine Studios: http://www.redpinestu...
Google Maps link to Studio located just outside Union SQ Somerville: http://maps.google.co...

Note that I (Biagio) do plan to run more events when the weather gets warmer like:
Outdoor photo shoots of Mount Auburn Cemetery, Forest Hills Cemetery (Jamaica Plain, MA), Great Meadows National Wildlife Refuge (Concord , MA), VT leaf peepping weekend trip in the fall Sept/Oct time frame., etc
item.how_to_find_us: Come into the Building start look for signs for RED Pine Studios. Enter then Walk straight take your first right walk straight again till you see a jog in the hallway then turn about right and to see a door with signs for RED Pine Studios.
item.why: Chance to mingle with other up and coming photographers and shares your comments on the Photo show.
item.name: Red Pine Studios Photo Show in Somerville
